alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:47PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Nuckolls and southern Thayer Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 347 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nora, or 28 miles northwest of Belleville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ruskin around 355 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Deshler, Byron, Hebron, Chester and Hubbell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
